title: Favorite Things To Do In The Summer

replies.body: This summer has to be watching every FIFA World Cup game. c;
replies.body_tagged: This summer has to be watching every FIFA World Cup game. c;

replies.body: just like you <3 play minecraft and swim in my pool <3 today I saved a baby duck in  my pool since him and its mom went in my pool and the baby duckling couldn't get out... sadly my dad got mad cause his ideas didn't work after 1 hour and my idea worked in less than 5 min
